events.message: I recently bought a jacket from your store, but I want to return it because it doesn't fit. Please let me know how I can get a refund.
The customer is requesting a refund for a recent purchase due to sizing issues; case assigned to the Refund cluster.
Support agent Maria has been assigned to handle the refund request for the returned jacket.
Hello! Thanks for reaching out to us. I’m Maria, and I’ll assist you with your refund request today.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the product is unused and in its original packaging for the return process?
My order number is 543210. The jacket is brand new and still in its original packaging, unopened since delivery.
Thank you for the details. You can ship the jacket back using our prepaid return label, and we’ll process your refund as soon as we receive it.
That sounds great, thank you for the clear instructions. I’ll send it back today and expect the refund soon.
We’ve now sent you the prepaid return label via email. Once we receive the product, your refund will be processed within 3-5 business days.
Just following up to confirm that your refund was successfully processed. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
The refund process for your jacket return is complete. Closing your support case, and thank you for contacting us.
